title: Chrissy Teigen blasted by heavy rain and wind in New York

text:
She certainly is a devoted wife.
Chrissy Teigen was spotted racing through the rain and wind to join husband John Legend as he was honored at the Time 100 Gala in New York on Tuesday night.
The 31-year-old had been attending another event earlier that evening and was clearly in a rush as she was soaked by heavy rain en route to the celebratory party, which John was already at.
